---
category: news
title: "Samsung slaps processing-in-memory chips onto GPUs for first-of-its-kind supercomputer"
excerpt: "The supercomputer, disclosed Tuesday at an industry event in South Korea, includes 96 AMD Instinct MI100 GPUs, each of which are loaded with a processing-in-memory (PIM) chip, a new kind of memory technology that reduces the amount of data that needs to move between the CPU and DRAM."
